panel.title: Your Route
panel.noBikesMessage: Start station currently has no bikes. Check nearby stations.
panel.noDocksMessage: End station is full. Consider a nearby station.
panel.noteMessage: This is a straight-line distance estimate. Actual cycling route may be longer depending on bike paths and streets.
panel.exportDescription: Download for GPS devices or Google Earth

auth.title: Sign in to Citibike
auth.subtitle: Enter your phone number to continue

phone.title: Enter Phone Number

phone.description: Enter your phone number to receive a verification code via SMS.

error.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

otp.title: Enter Verification Code

error.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

challenge.title: Verify your email
challenge.subtitle: For security, please confirm your email address
challenge.securityDescription: To confirm this is your account, please enter the email address associated with your Citibike account.
challenge.label: Email Address
challenge.helper: Enter the email associated with your account

error.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
error.server: Server error. Please try again later.
error.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
error.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.

privacy.title: Your privacy matters
privacy.phoneVerification: Phone number used for verification only
privacy.dataLocal: All data stays on your device

network.title: Network Error
network.message: Please check your internet connection and try again.

server.title: Server Error
server.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.maxLength: Must be no more than {{max}} characters

messages.otpSent: Verification code sent! Check your phone for a text from +1 (833) 504-2560.
messages.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please request a new code.

messages.serverError: An error occurred. Please try again.

metadata.title: Citibike Route Planner
metadata.description: Plan your Citibike route with real-time station availability
metadata.keywords: citibike, bike share, route planner, NYC, transportation

routeProfile.title: Route Preference

safest.name: Safest
safest.description: Prioritizes bike lanes and quiet streets

insane.name: Insane
insane.description: Shortest path, ignores traffic rules & lights

routeProfile.selectStations: Select start and end stations to choose route preference

legend.title: Station Markers
legend.iconsHelp: Icons show bike types without hovering

routeHistory.title: Saved Routes
routeHistory.noRoutesDescription: Plan a route and save it for quick access later

bikeAngel.title: Bike Angel
bikeAngel.description: Earn points by helping balance the Citibike system. Pick up bikes from full stations or drop off at empty ones to earn rewards!

page.errorLoadingMessage: Failed to fetch Citibike station data. Please try refreshing the page.
page.appSubtitle: Find the best route between stations
page.clickToStart: 👆 Click on a station or tap "Select Stations" to start

tripStats.title: Your Stats
tripStats.noTripsDescription: Click "Sync Trips" to load your ride history
tripStats.distanceEstimatedMiles: Distance and speed estimated from ride duration (~9 mph avg)
tripStats.distanceEstimatedKm: Distance and speed estimated from ride duration (~15 km/h avg)
tripStats.confirmClearAll: Are you sure you want to clear all trip data? This cannot be undone.
tripStats.allDataCleared: All trip data has been cleared!
tripStats.exportDataDescription: Download your trip data as JSON
tripStats.noDataToExport: No trips to export. Sync some trips first!
tripStats.cloudBackupDescription: Optional: Backup your trips to the cloud for cross-device access
tripStats.signInPrompt: Sign in to enable cloud backup
tripStats.notAuthenticated: Not authenticated. Please sign in first.

stationSelector.title: Select Stations
stationSelector.nearestStations: Showing 10 nearest stations to your location
stationSelector.locationError: Unable to get your location. Please enable location services.
stationSelector.geolocationUnsupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
stationSelector.noFavoritesHint: Click the ☆ star on any station to save it as a favorite
stationSelector.noStationsHint: Try a different search term or filter

tripHistory.noTripsDescription: Start tracking your Citibike rides to see analytics and insights
tripHistory.noTripsSubtext: Trips will be automatically saved when you complete a route

tripsPage.loginRequired: Please log in to view your trips
tripsPage.loginDescription: You need to be logged in with your Citibike account to see your trip history.
tripsPage.noTripsDescription: You haven't synced any trips yet. Go to the home page and sync your trip data to see your history.
tripsPage.title: Trip History

features.visualize: Visualize your ride history on an interactive map
features.heatmap: View heatmaps of your most-traveled routes
features.stats: Track detailed statistics and environmental impact
features.insights: Get insights on your riding patterns

tripVisualizationMap.noLocationData: Station coordinates for this trip are not available. The trip history API doesn't include location data.
tripVisualizationMap.futureUpdates: Future updates will fetch detailed trip data including routes and station locations.
tripVisualizationMap.chooseTrip: Choose a trip from the list to visualize it on the map

tripDetailsPanel.selectToView: Select a trip to view details
tripDetailsPanel.title: Trip Details
tripDetailsPanel.earnedForBalancing: Earned for helping balance the system
tripDetailsPanel.co2TreeEquivalent: Equivalent to the CO₂ absorbed by a tree in about {{hours}} hours
tripDetailsPanel.distanceEstimatedMiles: ~ Distance and speed estimated from ride duration (~9 mph avg)
tripDetailsPanel.distanceEstimatedKm: ~ Distance and speed estimated from ride duration (~15 km/h avg)

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Citibike Route Planner is a personal, open-source project. Your privacy is important

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.description: All data is stored locally on your device using IndexedDB. No data is sent to external servers except:

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.mapbox: Mapbox: Used for map rendering and route calculation
thirdParty.gbfs: Citibike GBFS API: Used for real-time station data
thirdParty.citibikeApi: Citibike API: Used for optional account login and trip sync (stored locally)

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.description: If you connect your Citibike account, we use httpOnly cookies to store authentication tokens securely. These are not accessible via JavaScript and are only used for API authentication

dataStorage.title: Data Storage
dataStorage.description: All trip data, preferences, and saved routes are stored in your browser's IndexedDB. You can clear this data at any time from your browser settings or from within the app

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For questions or concerns, please open an issue on

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using this Citibike Route Planner, you agree to these terms

usage.title: Usage
usage.description: This is a personal, non-commercial project. Use at your own risk. The developer is not affiliated with Citibike or Lyft

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee real-time station data or route accuracy. Always verify station availability before your trip

liability.title: Liability
liability.description: The developer is not liable for any issues arising from use of this app, including but not limited to: incorrect route information, station availability errors, or data loss

changes.title: Changes
changes.description: These terms may be updated at any time. Continued use of the app constitutes acceptance of any changes

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: This project is open source. You can view the source code on
